item.title: Design and Building of a Simple Banking Application
item.description: Introduction After a long time away from Java, I needed to write this small application. An interesting feature of this application quote-unquote is that it would be built without a mainstream DB, not even H2 database. This restriction from using already existing DBs largely influenced my design decisions for the application.
